title: Full Journey Script Playbook
objective: Provide one complete, ready-to-use word-track library for every step of the sales journey—from first greeting through post-sale follow-up and save-a-deal recovery.
position_in_journey: Greeting → Discovery → Presentation → Drive → Numbers → Close → Delivery → Follow-Up
learning_outcomes: Deliver a confident 10-second opening for walk-in, drive-up, and weather scenarios.
Set a clear agenda that reduces guest anxiety early.
Use structured discovery and transition language to guide decision-making.
Run a value-focused presentation and emotional test drive with clear prompts.
Present one-price numbers with calm confidence and concise objection handling.
Close clearly, deliver professionally, and execute post-sale follow-up scripts.
Apply a save-a-deal taillight follow-up that preserves trust and momentum.
